column1: Jack is in the kitchen in his house. Jack wants a cold drink from the refrigerator. The refrigerator is full of fresh food. A bird flies into the kitchen through the open window. Jack opens the refrigerator to get a cold drink.
column2: Does Jack think the food in the refrigerator is fresh or spoiled?
column3: Jack thinks the food in the refrigerator is fresh.
column4: Jack thinks the food in the refrigerator is spoiled.

column1: Caden is in his new house. Caden wants to fix all the things that are not right. There is a big leak in the roof. A bird lands on the roof. Caden plans to call a man to fix the leak.
column2: Does Caden think there is a leak in the roof or has the sun dried it up?
column3: Caden thinks there is still a leak in the roof.
column4: Caden thinks the sun has dried up the leak.

column1: Vivi is in her room playing with her toys. Vivi wants to lay her small, patient triangle toy on the shelf with her other toys. The triangle toy is in her toy box. A bird flies into the room through the open window. Vivi lays the triangle toy on the shelf.
column2: Does Vivi believe the triangle toy is in her toy box or that her baby brother has taken it?
column3: Vivi believes the triangle toy is in her toy box.
column4: Vivi believes her baby brother has taken the triangle toy.

column1: Emma is in her room after a long day at school. Emma wants to draw on her white bathrobe to make it look creative. The bathrobe is plain and white. A cat walks into Emma's room. Emma plans to start drawing on her bathrobe.
column2: Does Emma think the bathrobe is plain white or patchy white and yellow?
column3: Emma thinks the bathrobe is plain white.
column4: Emma thinks the bathrobe is patchy white and yellow.
